post.author: Brendan(김성욱)

comment.author: 이상훈
comment.content: How cheap is it? I pay for 10 cents a minutes to Primus

post.content:
I'd like to recommend one Korean service called 'ELTHE'. You can get information on www.elthe.co.kr or www.elthe.co.kr/service_index.php3
This service is the cheapest one among what I've found till now. This requires a headphone and a mic but some people can use it with a headset.
The quality is not the best, but it will not bother you so much compared to an ordinary phone card.
-------------- 시내전화 요금은 3분/66원(부가세포함) 입니다.
* 시내구간 및 시내요금 적용 지역
서울(02),성남(031),인천(032),대전(042),부산(051),대구(053),광주(062)
경기지역 중(031) : 수원,용인,안양,안산,김포,의정부,고양,구리,광주
충남지역 중 (041) : 논산,금산,공주,조치원
충북지역 중 (043) : 청주,보은,옥천
경북지역 중 (054) : 영천,청도,군위,창령,성주,고령,왜관
경남지역 중 (055) : 김해,밀양,양산
전남지역 중 (061) : 함평,나주,화순,담양,장성
post.title: If you make an international call to Korea frequently...
